quote: There comes a point when you win, and you can either soothe the loser into thinking there was something in it for them or kick them while they're down to make sure they know what just happened.
quote_letters: THERE COMES A POINT WHEN YOU WIN AND YOU CAN EITHER SOOTHE THE LOSER INTO THINKING THERE WAS SOMETHING IN IT FOR THEM OR KICK THEM WHILE THEYRE DOWN TO MAKE SURE THEY KNOW WHAT JUST HAPPENED
